description:
Sakura Chiyo, age 16, falls in love with a boorish classmate named Nozaki Umetaro. One day, she gathers her courage and confesses her feelings to him... but somehow there is a misunderstanding, and he gives her his autograph. Upon further misunderstanding, Nozaki invites Chiyo to his house, where she suddenly becomes a manga artist`s assistant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sono Koi wa, Shoujo Manga Kasarete Yuku.
This Love... Is Being Turned Into a Shojo Manga.
その恋は, 少女漫画化されてゆく.
